**Example 1: 修改设备信息示例**



Input: 

```
tccli trro ModifyDevice --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProjectId f3glr49ry0i0xlm7 \
    --DeviceId test1 \
    --DeviceName test_device \
    --DeviceToken abcd1234abcd1234
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "3c140219-cfe9-470e-b241-907877d6fb03"
    }
}
```
